enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding elements to a collection, making them suitable for setting up similar test scenarios.
The validate method is invoked within the add method to ensure the element meets the predicate criteria, suggesting similar state change patterns.
The createPredicatedBag method initializes a predicated collection which might need to be tested after elements are added using the add method.
The createPredicatedList method initializes a predicated list which might need to be tested after elements are added using the add method.
The createPredicatedMultiSet method initializes a predicated multiset which might need to be tested after elements are added using the add method.
The createPredicatedQueue method initializes a predicated queue which might need to be tested after elements are added using the add method.
The createPredicatedSet method initializes a predicated set which might need to be tested after elements are added using the add method.
